sentence.Network_en: It no doubt rivaled Mt . Shasta and Mt . Ranier in its snow covered magnificence.
sentence.Network_cn: 其壮丽的雪景无疑可与沙斯塔山和雷尼尔山相媲美.

sentence.Network_en: It is shasta that the analysis and evaluation are agreeable to the experimental results.
sentence.Network_cn: 验证表明,理论分析评定与实测结果一致.

sentence.Network_en: Shasta , we took a vote and decided to help you start a dogsled team.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们投票决定帮你组织一支雪橇队.

PerfectNetExp.abs: shashlik 穿刺浸酒烤肉块, shasta 大滨菊, shassen 沙森

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Indian people of northern California and southern Oregon
2. a volcanic mountain peak in the Cascade Range in northern California (14,162 feet high)
3. the Shastan language spoken by the Shasta people
